ComicInfo.Summary:
David Hine's story arc concludes in this issue with a horrific, immoral twist. The Crossed have invaded 'Stumptown' and appear to have missed finding the mansion of the reclusive, twisted Gideon Wells. But with a fateful infection, one vengeful student decides to teach the master a lesson in depravity, as only the Crossed can deliver! There is no hope. There is no help. There is only the Crossed.
Available with a Regular or Wraparound by Gianluca Pagliarani, Torture cover by Raulo Caceres, and a special Red Crossed Incentive by Pagliarani.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/crossed-badlands-18/4000-370305/
